content.about:
1\. Prestige Estate Services provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in 19th–20th-century furniture • Fine art • Jewelry • Collectibles • Insurance/documentation support  
+ Certifications:  
  International Society of Appraisers (ISA) • Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice (USPAP) • IRS-compliant reports  
+ Team Members:  
  - Erika Holycross – Master’s degree holder (Fine Arts), former auction-house manager ([3][8])    
  - Edward Kitson, Elizabeth Lovett, Ste. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Philadelphia area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Emily W.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Karen J.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Robert A.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Robert R.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

content.about: Philadelphia Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Philadelphia area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
